Title: Emerald Welcome
Description:
We protected the tree by guarding all entrances to the Emerald Dream. Now Fyrakk has found allies to open the way for him.

I will do the same for you and our allies. The green dragonflight cannot do this alone.

Through this portal, we will enter the Dream together. We must protect that realm and all that grows within it.
ObjectivesText: Enter the Emerald Dream through the portal in Ancient Bough.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Merithra in the Emerald Dream.
